refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A seeie identifies a See cross reference in an indexentry. The indexentrys occur in an index, not in the flow of the text. They are part of a formatted index, not markers for indexing.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: The indexentrys that include a seeie should be formatted normally, with the See also indented below the term. There should be no other entries for this term.
The seeie is usually expected to generate the text, See.
The linkend attribute should point to the referenced indexentrys, which should be in the same index. Online systems may use the link information to form a hypertext link.
